mean_en: not showing much care or thought; seeming not to be worried; not wanting to show that something is important to you; without paying attention to detail
sentence: She prefers casual clothing when hanging out on the street.
sentence_trans: 在街上闲逛时，她偏好休闲的穿着。
word_etyma: cas落下 + ual……的 → 突然降临的，不是安排好的 → casual偶然的
